reviewText: This is a good movie for teachers and counselors to use with kids.
Any Charlie Brown flick is fun and cute!

Good specials, but why does Warner keep releasing the same ones that are already out and not the others? He's a Bully was included on the You're Not Elected Charlie Brown DVD, It Was a Short Summer was on the 1960s collection set, and the Charlie Brown and Snoopy Show is out in its entirety on DVD. Why does Warner feel the need to release the same ones again when there are others that are still not on DVD? Where are A Charlie Brown Celebration, It's An Adventure Charlie Brown, Snoopy the Musical, It's the Girl In the Red Truck, It Was My Best Birthday Ever Charlie Brown, and It's the Pied Piper Charlie Brown? Those are the ones that still need a DVD release. Warner needs to release those on DVD, not ones that are already out.
Three Charlie Brown's that I haven't seen or maybe I've seen them only once.  I don't want to spoil anything but Charlie Brown does win sometimes.
I love collecting Peanuts items, a cute DVD.
My boys love anything that includes Charlie Brown and The Peanuts Gang....good lesson taught....great dvd!!!!
I love all things Snoopy and Peanuts!
My son loves it! We watch the movie over and over. Great messages at the end of any Charlie Brown Flick.
